*dataset_sql.Select
  dataset_sql.Comments
  dataset_sql.SelectExprs
    *dataset_sql.AliasedExpr
      *dataset_sql.FuncExpr
        dataset_sql.TableIdent
        dataset_sql.ColIdent
        dataset_sql.SelectExprs
          *dataset_sql.AliasedExpr
            *dataset_sql.ColName
              dataset_sql.ColIdent
              dataset_sql.TableName
                dataset_sql.TableIdent
                dataset_sql.TableIdent
            dataset_sql.ColIdent
      dataset_sql.ColIdent

      dataset_sql.TableName
        dataset_sql.TableIdent
        dataset_sql.TableIdent
      dataset_sql.TableIdent
      *dataset_sql.IndexHints
  *dataset_sql.Where
    *dataset_sql.ComparisonExpr
      *dataset_sql.ColName
        dataset_sql.ColIdent
        dataset_sql.TableName
          dataset_sql.TableIdent
          dataset_sql.TableIdent
      *dataset_sql.SQLVal
  dataset_sql.GroupBy
